rooms.description: Narrow entrance hall with minimal design and natural lighting.
Spacious open living area adjacent to the kitchen and dining area with large windows for natural light, keeping West-facing aesthetics in mind and Vastu principles of clear flow.
Integrated within the open living space; designed to be functional yet minimalist.
Modern kitchen with sleek finishes, ensuring functionality and efficient layout in accordance with Vastu principles for prosperity.
Functional guest bedroom designed with minimalist aesthetics and adequate storage.
Spacious master bedroom located in the east section to benefit from positive energy according to Vastu guidelines.
Compact bathroom with modern fixtures and ventilation for comfort.
Entertainment area integrated within the ground floor with soundproofing; placed in a quiet corner away from heavy traffic to comply with minimalist design and provide a conducive environment.

openings.description: Large main entrance door designed for aesthetic appeal and easy access, oriented towards the front of the house.
Large window openings throughout to ensure ample natural light while maintaining energy efficiency.
Balcony attached to the living room for extra ventilation and outdoor access; designed with minimalist railings.
